s: ^Beautiful weather in Bloomwood today, right? I can't complain about it!

Chat1: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "This weather is BEAUTIFUL. I think I just decided to take a little walk on my break."

s: ^Do you remember Dr. Lee? I was just visiting with Mrs. Lee.
^That sounds really nice! Hey, do you have time and space right now to give some advice on high blood pressure

Chat2: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "Now that you mention Dr. Lee, I do recall he used to love this weather."
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "We would sometimes get lunch together, but only when the sun was high in the sky like this. The sun brought that man to life like nothing else."

s: ^Neat! I didn't know you were close with Dr. Lee.
^That is a really nice memory you have of Dr. Lee.

Chat3: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Yes it's just so tragic that he passed. Heart attacks are no joke."

s: ^Do you know what caused Dr. Lee's heart attack?
^My heart goes out to Mrs. Lee

Explain1: ^Mrcalindas_Day 1_At-home monitoring machines can be used for monitoring blood pressure

Explain1.#: notification Mrcalindas_Day 1_At-home monitoring machines can be used for monitoring blood pressure

Explain1: ^Mrcalindas_Day 1_High blood pressure can lead to heart attacks

Explain1.#: notification Mrcalindas_Day 1_High blood pressure can lead to heart attacks

Explain1: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Yeah, high blood pressure, y'know, it can contribute to a fatal heart attack if you don't keep it in check."

^Mrcalindas?Neutral "With the right medications, lifestyle changes, and at-home monitoring machines, you really can improve your outcome. I wish he'd done more to understand his condition. I'm sure Mrs. Lee feels the same."

s: ^How can I learn more about this?
^Thank you so much for giving me your time, Mr. Calindas

Explain2: ^Mrcalindas_Day 1_Drug information portal can be used to look up medications_Mrslee1-2

Explain2.#: notification Mrcalindas_Day 1_Drug information portal can be used to look up medications_Mrslee1-2

Explain2: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "Actually, I got a minute. We have several secure online resources. Look at this one - it's a drug information portal, where you can look up medications."
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "And this one is a site for reading up on different health conditions - like high blood pressure. You can access them from here, or your home computer."

s: ^Thank you so much for this information!
^I will definitely have to check this out for myself
